scripts.check:encodings: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');const exts=new Set(['.ts','.tsx','.js','.jsx','.cjs','.mjs','.json','.css','.scss','.sass','.html','.md','.sql','.yml','.yaml']);function isUTF8(b){let i=0;while(i<b.length){const c=b[i];if(c<=0x7F){i++;continue;}if((c&0xE0)===0xC0){if(i+1>=b.length)return false;const c1=b[i+1];if((c1&0xC0)!==0x80)return false;i+=2;continue;}if((c&0xF0)===0xE0){if(i+2>=b.length)return false;const c1=b[i+1],c2=b[i+2];if((c1&0xC0)!==0x80||(c2&0xC0)!==0x80)return false;i+=3;continue;}if((c&0xF8)===0xF0){if(i+3>=b.length)return false;const c1=b[i+1],c2=b[i+2],c3=b[i+3];if((c1&0xC0)!==0x80||(c2&0xC0)!==0x80||(c3&0xC0)!==0x80)return false;i+=4;continue;}return false;}return true;}function walk(dir){for(const f of fs.readdirSync(dir)){const fp=p.join(dir,f);let s;try{s=fs.statSync(fp);}catch{continue;}if(s.isDirectory()){if(['node_modules','.next','.vercel','dist','build','.git'].includes(f))continue;walk(fp);}else{const ext=p.extname(f);if(!exts.has(ext))continue;if(fp.includes('instance'+p.sep+'attendance_system.db'))continue;let b;try{b=fs.readFileSync(fp);}catch{continue;}if(!isUTF8(b)){console.log('Non-UTF8:',fp);}}}}walk('.')"
